name: ZombieSurvival
0:
”Alexa open Zombie Survival”
”Alexa ask Zombie Survival to start a new game”
”Alexa, ask Zombie Survival to continue my game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zombie survival
des:
In a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by a deadly virus, you are the leader of a small group of survivors. Civilization has collapsed, and the undead roam the streets, hungry for human flesh. Every decision you make will determine the fate of your group as you navigate through this dangerous new world. 

In Zombie Survival, your choices carry weight. A simple "yes" or "no" can have far-reaching consequences, affecting everything from your supplies to the lives of your fellow survivors. Will you take risks to scavenge for food and resources, or will you play it safe and fortify your defenses? Will you welcome new survivors, or turn them away to protect your own? 

As you make these critical decisions, you'll need to manage your resources wisely and keep morale high to ensure your group stays united and strong. The fate of humanity is in your hands. Can you lead your people to safety, or will you succumb to the relentless horde? 

Welcome to Zombie Survival. Your leadership will be tested. Your resolve will be challenged. And your choices will shape the future.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Zombie Survival
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
